rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance area with foyer and coat closet designed to promote natural ventilation and lighting.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living space with large windows for ample natural light, adjacent to a semi-open dining space ensuring optimal airflow. This space aligns with Vastu principles by placing the main entrance in the north-west direction to welcome positive energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and ample ventilation. The design uses non-toxic materials and incorporates natural light through a glass wall.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master suite with an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, featuring large windows to maximize daylight while maintaining privacy and adhering to Vastu guidelines for the bedroom placement.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room with natural ventilation and light. Placed in a location that aligns with Vastu norms to ensure energy flow.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space designed for productivity, featuring large windows, ergonomic design, and soundproofing while ensuring ample exposure to natural light as per eco-friendly principles.

openings.description: Windows are strategically placed to maximize daylight penetration and cross-ventilation, reducing dependency on artificial lighting and cooling systems.
Provide seamless transition between indoor and outdoor areas enhancing natural ventilation and creating an open feel.
